RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GAMING SOUL unhurried early circled out to upper stretch finding a late burst racing past mid track sweeping clear in the final yards. BAYTOWN BEAVER set the pace digging in with a clear lead lane being overwhelmed from the outside late. ELEGGUA stalked the pace laying close to upper stretch vying from mid track there finishing evenly. NORTHERN RUNNER saved ground to upper stretch gaining a spot late inside. COMMANDER CODY stalked the oace vying on the far turn weakening the final eighth. TRUST FUND ROBBER tracked the pace vying on the inside in upper stretch fading late. SENSE OF GOLDEN was never involved. JACK D played no factor. MY WROTE folded up on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to lane, gained a spot

ENTRY.NAME: My Wrote
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up on the far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Eleggua
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, mid track lane, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Trust Fund Robber
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, vied inside lane, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Gaming Soul
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, circled out to lane, surged past mid track clear

ENTRY.NAME: Baytown Beaver
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, dug in lane, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Jack D
ENTRY.OWNER: Bland Gregory R and Agler Trey
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Commander Cody
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, vied far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sense of Golden
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 6 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JILL BABE prompted the pace vying three deep the final sixteenth extending up at end. RIVERVIEW STEVIE veered bumped rival at the break, went evenly to the turn saving ground to emerge boldly along the inside in upper stretch dueling gamely to the wire. SHELLY THE ROCKET set a pressured pace digging in down the lane ceding late between horses. THE REIGN SONG was bumped hard at the break, rallied to contention on the turn then leveled while racing wide down the lane. ADABEL played no factor. LADY MECHANIC faded on the turn. MISS MARPLE was always outrun. W H LITTLE MISS GO showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Shelly the Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, dug in lane, ceded between late

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Marple
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Jill Babe
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, bid three deep lane, extended up

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Mechanic
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: W H Little Miss Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Adabel
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Riverview Stevie
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered bumped break, rallied inside upper stretch, bid gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: The Reign Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped hard start, rallied on turn, leveled wide lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 6 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANT GLIDE BY KATZ surged to the front on the turn dueling abreast rival in upper stretch bearing down to clear late. ANGUSONIC pressed on the turn dueling inside of rival in upper stretch ceding late hanging on for place. BEND IN THE RIVER chased the pace racing five wide down the lane battling late for minors. WHISKEY SUNRISE slow early lost ground to upper stretch finishing evenly. RIVER ANT hustled along wore down the final eighth. INGERSOLL led early then faded on the turn. THE FIVE B'S gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J

ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Cant Glide by Katz
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged to top turn, dueled abreast lane, worked clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 6, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 6 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,00 0 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNION STATION gained on the far turn looming from mid track in upper stretch angling in a bit while rallying up late. CHOPPED tracked the pace bidding on the far turn leading abreast foe in upper stretch digging in late ceding to outside pressure. GREENSFELDER slow early circled out coming seven wide in upper stretch rallying late. DUDLEY pressed clear on the backside being hooked from the outside in upper stretch dueling before wearing out late. KANTPAYTHETOLL pressed early then chased through the far turn wearing out inside in upper stretch. GOOD IDEA tracked early then gave way on the far turn. CRUMLIN EXPERIENCE failed to respond. TAKECHARGEJUSTICE raced evenly through the far turn tiring down the lane. MONEY PIT stalked the pace fading into upper stretch. PONT DU GARD was never involved.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: DAY THE MUSIC DIED chased the pace drawing even abreast foe in upper stretch edging away late. AW ITE sent clear set the pace through the turn being collared from the outside in upper stretch responding though no match late. WIZARD WILLIE chased the pace through the turn racing evenly on the inside down the lane. TAINO slow early raced evenly holding position down the lane. K'S LITTLE BILL played no factor. MASKED faded on the turn. AWESOME OX was always outrun. OSBIN raced second flight tiring in upper stretch.

FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 6, 2022 OR CLAIMING $6,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 6 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUBBA GRUMP bid clear on the turn digging in from the four path down the lane widening some under a drive. MYSTIC O'SHAUNESIE pressed in bid on the turn chasing down the lane proving a game second best. BLACK CANDY slow early rallied on the inside in upper stretch finishing evenly. SPUNMAN slow early was never in it passing a few down the lane. HUMPTY GRUMPTY set the early pace being passed on the turn fading the final eighth. TIMBERRY TIDDLER played no factor. OMEGA GOLD flashed early speed then gave way on the turn.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since Octobe r 6 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONFESSOR surged to the front on the far turn dueling abreast rival down the lane needing all to prevail. HIGH ROLLING DUDE pressed the pace dueling through the far turn then down the stretch battling gamely on the inside of rival to the wire. SURF AND TURF pressed the pace ceding on the far turn racing evenly through the stretch. HAGLER advanced to pressure on the backside dueling through the far turn wearing out in upper stretch. LATIN SPICE hustled along pressed the pace through the backside wearing out on the far turn. LOW COUNTRY DUDE gave a prompted middle move then flattened out on the far turn. CHOCOLATE PHILLING was always outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, chased to lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, flattened out,

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, pressed pace, faded far turn

Non-winners Of A Race Since October 6 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUNGI pressed the pace shaking clear in upper stretch drawing off as much the best. PRIVATE CONNIE slow early lost ground to upper stretch coming on late six wide. BOURBON TALKING pressed the pace dueling on the turn ceding in upper stretch weakening late. KRAZY HAWK slow early lagged to upper stretch passing tired ones there seven wide. SCREAMING JEREMY raced evenly lacking more. BLACK BULL played no factor. HAPPY YEARS chased to upper stretch tiring inside late. OXBOW'S RIDE faded on the turn. LOCKDOWN LOVER pressed through the turn giving way in upper stretch. VAMOS ANTONIO was always outrun.
